short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yugioh wallpaper turn new tab to HD Yu-Gi-Oh! background. Custom Yugioh wallpaper background theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Yu-Gi-Oh! wallpapers every time you open a new tab.  
2. Choose random Yu-Gi-Oh! backgrounds or favorite specific ones through the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Search bar with results from your preferred search engine.  
4. Convenient quick access to your emails and social media accounts.  
5. Display the current date and time automatically.  
6. Take notes easily with a "New Note" feature to jot down tasks.  
7. Effortless access to your most visited websites.  
8. Quick access to your bookmarks.  
9. Add websites to a Shortcut panel for instant access.  
10. Direct access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and apply more themes with a single click.  
12. Easy sharing of content to social media platforms.  
13. Download wallpapers quickly with one-click functionality.  
14. Instant access to play games.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Yu-Gi-Oh! new tab.
